name: Metal & Lace: The Battle of the Robo Babes
name_original: Metal & Lace: The Battle of the Robo Babes
description:
Metal & Lace: The Battle of the Robo Babes is an arcade-fighting game developed by MegaTech Software. It was originally released in 1993. MegaTech Software published the game.
You can play Metal & Lace: The Battle of the Robo Babes on PC.
